import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import TipFaucet from '../../_admonitions/_tip-faucet.md';

Once you have [created your account](../accounts-and-addresses/create-account.mdx) and
[requested funds from the faucet](./request-funds.mdx) you are ready to send your first
transaction.

<TipFaucet />

## Example Code

The following example will:

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple_transaction.rs#L30-L33
```

</div>

2. Sync the wallet with the node to get the latest transactions by calling the [`Wallet.sync()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.sync)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple_transaction.rs#L36
```

</div>

3. Send the defined `SEND_AMOUNT` to an address using the [`Wallet.send()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.send) function.
   Make sure to update the code sample to send to the address of your choice.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple_transaction.rs#L44
```

</div>

4. Await for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](file:///home/lucas/Documents/IOTA/iota-sdk/target/doc/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple_transaction.rs#L46-L48
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple-transaction.ts#L26-L28
```

</div>

2. Sync the wallet with the node to get the latest transactions by calling the [`Wallet.sync()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#sync)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple-transaction.ts#L30
```

</div>

3. Send the defined `amount` to an `address` using the [`Wallet.send()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/nodejs/classes/Wallet/#send) function.
Make sure to update the code sample to send to the address of your choice.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple-transaction.ts#L38-L42
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple_transaction.py#L17
```

</div>

2. Sync the wallet with the node to get the latest transactions by calling the [`Wallet.sync()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#sync)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple_transaction.py#L20
```

</div>

3. Define the `amount` to send and the `address` to send to in the [`SendParams`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/types/send_params/).
    Make sure to update the code sample to send to the address of your choice.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple_transaction.py#L24-L27
```

</div>

3. Send the transaction using the [`Wallet.send_with_params()`](http://localhost:3000/iota-sdk/2.0/references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/#send_with_params) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/simple_transaction/simple_transaction.py#L29
```

</div>

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

### Expected Output

```plaintext
Block sent: https://explorer.shimmer.network/testnet/block/0x47ec97658791954b9bcd5e47e6791396e3f340b82e81fe2cc7218f52ebec3804
```
